query: "Design and implement a high-performance, real-time distributed data processing system in Python that can handle 1 million+ messages per second from Apache Kafka, with the following requirements: 1) Stream Processing using Apache Flink or Spark Streaming, 2) FastAPI microservices with async/await, 3) Sharded PostgreSQL and Redis, 4) Real-time ML inference with TensorFlow/PyTorch Serving, 5) OpenTelemetry tracing and Prometheus monitoring, 6) Kubernetes deployment with auto-scaling, 7) Sub-100ms latency with 99.9% uptime. Include code examples, architecture diagrams, performance benchmarks, and production considerations. Compare technology stacks for 2024-2025."

Brave ads formats Search Ads New Tab Takeover Notification Ads More ads resources Get Brave Search the Web Transparency Data Feed Brave Browser Stats & Rewards/BAT Activity Brave Browser User Growth ( ) Monthly Active Users Daily Active Users Verified Creators by Platform Combined growth over time Category Current Total YouTube Websites X (formerly Twitter) Twitch Reddit GitHub Vimeo Recent Brave-Initiated BAT Purchases Date Tokens Source As part of the Brave Rewards program, users who participate in Brave Ads receive 70% of the advertising revenue. That reward comes in the form of Basic Attention Tokens, purchased with advertiser dollars (or other fiat currency, when the advertiser does not pay in BAT). These routine purchases are listed in the table above. Uphold entries contain a link to a public record of the transaction; no such link is available for Coinbase or Gemini purchases at this time. Brave Ads — Supported Countries (Active Campaigns) See the list of supported countries for connecting a custodial account to Brave Rewards in order to withdraw BAT earnings from Brave Ads. About the Transparency Report This page is intended to help you, the visitor, understand the growth, development, and ongoing impact of the Brave Browser, the Brave Rewards program, and the associated Basic Attention Token. This page will communicate the size and scope of daily and monthly browser usage, the Verified Creator community, activity within the Brave Ads platform, routine conversions of advertiser dollars into BAT tokens, and more. The information presented here is updated regularly, and will encompass additional data points in the future. Get Brave Resources Help center Community What's new in Brave?
